paper_title.ja: Asymmetric Conjugate Addition Reaction Using Pyrazole Derivatives as a Chiral Catalyst
Chiral symmetry breaking of axially chiral N-aryl-2(1H)-pyrimidinones by spontaneous crystallization
Intramolecular Long-Distance Hydrogen Abstraction Reactions of Carbonyl Compounds

paper_title.en: Asymmetric Conjugate Addition Reaction Using Pyrazole Derivatives as a Chiral Catalyst
Chiral symmetry breaking of axially chiral N-aryl-2(1H)-pyrimidinones by spontaneous crystallization
Sulfur-containing heterocycles derived by reaction of N-thioacylamino alcohols with Lawesson's reagent and saponification of N-thioacylamino esters

description.en: The treatment of 2-N-thioacylamino alcohols (1) with Lawesson's reagent [LR: 2,4-bis(p-methoxyphenyl)-1,3,2,4-dithiaphosphetane 2,4-disulfide] afforded the sulfur-containing heterocycles, 1,3-thiazolines (2) in moderate to good yields, exclusively. The saponification of N-thioacylamino esters (4), which were prepared by the thionation of N-acylamino esters (3) with LR, with K2CO3 gave 3,1-benezothiazines (5) and 3,1-benzoxazines (6).

paper_title.en: Sulfur-containing heterocycles derived by reaction of N-thioacylamino alcohols with Lawesson's reagent and saponification of N-thioacylamino esters

description.en: The treatment of 2-N-thioacylamino alcohols (1) with Lawesson's reagent [LR: 2,4-bis(p-methoxyphenyl)-1,3,2,4-dithiaphosphetane 2,4-disulfide] afforded the sulfur-containing heterocycles, 1,3-thiazolines (2) in moderate to good yields, exclusively. The saponification of N-thioacylamino esters (4), which were prepared by the thionation of N-acylamino esters (3) with LR, with K2CO3 gave 3,1-benezothiazines (5) and 3,1-benzoxazines (6).

paper_title.ja: K-Na 合金によるＰＣＢ混合物（ＫＣ600)の脱塩素化
paper_title.en: Dechlorination of PCB Mixture (KC600) with K-Na Alloy

description.ja: 常温で液体であるK-Na合金を使って, PCB混合物製品であるKC600の脱塩素化を研究した。シクロヘキサンを溶媒としてアルゴン気流中室温下で, KC600をK-Na合金と撹拌接触させると, 約30分後に99.999914%のPCBが完全に脱塩素化された。PCBの初期濃度は7, 900mg/lで, 30分後の濃度は0.0068mg/lであった。PCBに含まれていた塩素原子はほぼ100%が無機の塩化物イオンに変化した。脱塩素化反応の主生成物はビフェニル, シクロヘキシルベンゼン, ジシクロヘキシルであった。これらのことから, K-Na合金によるPCBの無害化処理は還元的脱塩素化反応と考えられる。
description.en: Dechlorination of KC600 as PCB mixtures by using K-Na alloy was investigated. Dechlorination yield reached 99.999914 % when PCB was contacted in cyclohexane with K-Na alloy under argon atmosphere at room temperature for 30 minutes. The initial and final concentrations of PCB were 7, 900 mg/l and 0.0068 mg/l, respectively. Chlorine atoms in PCB changed to inorganic chloride ion at a yield of 99.9999 %. Main reaction products were biphenyl, cyclohexylbenzene, and dicyclohexyl. This result suggests that this reaction is reductive dechlorination.

paper_title.ja: Thionation of ω-Aeylamino Ketones with Lawesson's Reagent : Convenient Synthesis of 1, 3-Thiazoles and 4H-1, 3-Thiazines
Stereoselective Synthesis of 4H-5, 6-Dihydro-1, 3-thiazlnes by the Reactin of 3-N-Acylamino Alcobols unih Lauesson's Reagent
Thionation of N-Acylthreonine and its Methyl Ester with Lawesson's reagent : Synthesis of 5-Oxazolones, 5-Thiazolones and Thiazolines

paper_title.en: Thionation of ω-Aeylamino Ketones with Lawesson's Reagent : Convenient Synthesis of 1, 3-Thiazoles and 4H-1, 3-Thiazines
Stereoselective Synthesis of 4H-5, 6-Dihydro-1, 3-thiazlnes by the Reactin of 3-N-Acylamino Alcobols unih Lauesson's Reagent
Thionation of N-acylthreonine and its methyl ester with Lawesson's reagent: Synthesis of 5-oxazolones, 5-thiazolones and thiazolines

description.en: The treatment of N-acylthreonine (1) with Lawesson's reagent [LR: 2,4-bis(p-methoxyphenyl)-1,3,2,4-dithiaphosphetane 2,4-disulfide] afforded 5-oxazolones (2) in moderate yields, along with 5-thiazolones (3). On the other hand, N- acylthreonine methyl ester (5) reacted with LR to give 5-thiazolones (3) and 4-methoxycarbonylthiazolines (6).

paper_title.en: Dechlorination of hexachlorobiphenyl by using potassium sodium alloy

description.en: 2,2',4,4',5,5'-Hexachlorobiphenyl (HCB) was dechlorinated with potassium-sodium (K-Na) alloy under an inert gas atmosphere. Solvent effect was observed in the reaction. Dechlorination yields in benzene and cyclohexane were 99.9998% and 99.99996%, respectively. The reaction was exothermic and proceeded at room temperature. In benzene, trace amounts of polychlorinated biphenyls (PCBs) as products by stepwise dechlorination and polychlorinated quarterphenyls as product of Wurtz-Fittig reaction were detected as reaction intermediate. Reaction products were biphenyl, cyclohexylbenzene, and dicyclohexyl. In cyclohexane, there were no products of Wurtz-Fittig reaction. Dechlorination at para-position preferred to that at ortho-position, judging from analysis of PCBs as intermediates of stepwise dechlorination. (C) 2000 Elsevier Science Ltd. All rights reserved.

paper_title.en: Dechlorination of hexachlorobiphenyl by using potassium sodium alloy

description.en: 2,2',4,4',5,5'-Hexachlorobiphenyl (HCB) was dechlorinated with potassium-sodium (K-Na) alloy under an inert gas atmosphere. Solvent effect was observed in the reaction. Dechlorination yields in benzene and cyclohexane were 99.9998% and 99.99996%, respectively. The reaction was exothermic and proceeded at room temperature. In benzene, trace amounts of polychlorinated biphenyls (PCBs) as products by stepwise dechlorination and polychlorinated quarterphenyls as product of Wurtz-Fittig reaction were detected as reaction intermediate. Reaction products were biphenyl, cyclohexylbenzene, and dicyclohexyl. In cyclohexane, there were no products of Wurtz-Fittig reaction.
